query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `research_authors` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `nameAr` varchar(255),
  `affiliation` varchar(255),
  `affiliationAr` varchar(255),
  `orcid` varchar(50),
  `email` varchar(320),
  `bio` text,
  `bioAr` text,
  `profileUrl` text,
  `publicationCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `citationCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `research_authors_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  INDEX `name_idx` (`name`),
  INDEX `affiliation_idx` (`affiliation`)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4DB9hJWqLzCzJpD.4ae2ba9639dc --database XodoyKMzPdFiKkVj3QFTGK --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `research_authors` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `nameAr` varchar(255),
  `affiliation` varchar(255),
  `affiliationAr` varchar(255),
  `orcid` varchar(50),
  `email` varchar(320),
  `bio` text,
  `bioAr` text,
  `profileUrl` text,
  `publicationCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `citationCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `research_authors_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  INDEX `name_idx` (`name`),
  INDEX `affiliation_idx` (`affiliation`)
);
